pageContext.claim: “The U.S. will soon control 100% of ISIS territory in Syria. @CNN (do you believe this?)”
pageContext.analysis: Trump goes too far to claim the United States will "control" 100 percent of ISIS territory. ISIS has lost just about 100 percent of its former caliphate in Syria, but at least one third is controlled by the Syria regime or Turkey, not U.S. partners in the conflict.
